item.title: Testing ox-hugo
item.description: A basic post where do they go? tags are ignored here, they are properties. is auto-save working? yes An image inline %matplotlib inline import matplotlib.pyplot as plt plt.plot([1, 2, 4, 8]); def func(x): return 2 * x func(3) 6 testing line highlighting. Line 2 should be highlighted and numbered. 1 2 3 (message "This is line 1") (message "This is line 2") (message "This is line 3") citations A reference (Kitchin 2015).
